titleInfo.title: Letter, Robert Henderson of Murfreesboro, Tenn., to Naomi Eliza, William, and J.G.M. Ramsey of Knoxville, Tenn. 1821 Jan. 21

mods.abstract: 1821 Jan. 21 Robert Henderson, Murfreesboro, Tenn., to Naomi Eliza Ramsey, William Baine Ramsey, and J.G.M. Ramsey, Knoxville, E.T. Conveyance of sympathy on the death of their father, Francis A. Ramsey, the writer's closest friend. Promises to preach a sermon on Col. Ramsey in East Tennessee if possible. Special condolences to Eliza.

subject.topic: Interpersonal relations -- Tennessee -- Religious aspects -- History -- 19th century
Friendship -- Tennessee -- Religious aspects -- History -- 19th century
Ramsey, Francis A. (Francis Alexander), 1764-1820 -- Death and burial
